snippet: The Nets’ Andrei Kirilenko, 33, and Sergey Karasev, 20, share a basketball connection that started years ago in Russia.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets’ Andrei Kirilenko and Sergey Karasev share a basketball connection that began years ago in Russia; in late 1990s, when Kirilenko was a promising teenager playing for CSKA Moscow in the Russian league, he helped Sergey, then the 5-year-old son of veteran point guard Vasily Karasev, dunk from atop his shoulders.
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ Andrei Kirilenko, 33, and Sergey Karasev, 20, share a basketball connection that started years ago in Russia.

headline.seo: Sergey Karasev's Role Model, Andrei Kirilenko, Is Now His Teammate
headline.main: With Nets, a New Guard Finds Old Ties
headline.print_headline: With Nets, a New Guard Finds Old Ties
